title: Client constantly trying to reconnect
body: So I have had other players  in my community mention this and when i got home my client was in the process of trying to reconnect.  I restarted client completely and over the next 5 minutes  I had 3 occasions where it was happening again.  My internet is running fine with 120mb DL and 13mb upload so this isn't on my end, especially since other people are having similar issues.

replies.body: We're currently investigating an issue where players are disconnecting, and have disabled ranked queues in the meantime.  We'll be providing updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page as well.  Hang tight, and I'll let you know more as I do.
It's happening to me as well rip playing our games.

Same. I know it's not my internet also since I've got other things running and not being effected one bit.
The client also has done it multiple times in a row. The first time during champ select in a ranked game and lost me LP/timer.
